name: The Blind Trail
description:
You play as a blind man, visiting your parents who recently moved out of the city to live deep in the woods. You try your best to navigate through the forest with the directions your parents gave you. Fortunately, there is a convenient trail…

Controls

WASD to move

  • AD to rotate
  • WS to walk forwards and backwards

Sound Cues

Follow the sound of the crows resting on the lamppost, leading you closer to your destination.

Be sure to walk on the gravel and stay on the path.

If you veer off the path too much, you will collide with an electrical fence and hear a hum.
